    Sean Business International Sdn Bhd Vacancies ACCOUNTS ASSISTANT

    October 25, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Sean Business International Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for ACCOUNTS ASSISTANT position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    ACCOUNTS ASSISTANT

    • High Competitive Salary Package with Quarterly Performance Bonus

    • A rare opportunity for you to be trained by top account experts

    • Great Career Advancement

    Are You Frustrated Of ...

    Fire­fighting, Multi­tasking and even working late almost everyday and still not being appreciated by your company? Are you bored of working day in & day out without learning anything new? Are you stuck with the same amount of salary every month no matter how hard you work for the company? Your career seems going no where even if you are a high­performer & self­learner   

    Who We Are:

    About Sean Business International We exist to support organizations through business systems and training around Malaysia. In the last 4 years we have transformed more than 300 companies and business owners, enabled them to regain back their time freedom and expand their businesses. We are aiming to impact 10,000 companies in 5 years, helping them in training right talent staffs, business growth automation and doubling their company profit. As we expand globally, we are looking for the right individual who is self-driven and professionally competent, to be part of our A team. If you are result & quality orientated and will strive to perform, then SBI is the place for you. Please do not read on unless you value the same values like us.

    What We Really Look At:

    -         You have passion in accounting and management. You are sharp, precise & careful with figures. You are someone who is very organized and like to analyse.

    -         You are timely and punctual. You complete your tasks before its deadline.

    -         You believe that system, process and figures are essential in management

    -         Your motivation & willingness to learn. You may not have the academic qualification, but you continue to improve & grow through your working experience.

    -         Your loyalty and integrity. We value our performers. We have SBI team members who have been with us since Day 1. We value transparency & teamwork in everything we do.

    -         Your command of English & Mandarin languages. As we do international events, your ability to write & communicate clearly with precise articulation are expected.

    -         You are responsible and committed. You are not afraid of hard work and will do whatever it takes to get a task done if the situation requires you to do so.

    -         Your intention in everything you do is good, you care about people and you care about the company.

    Accounting

    - Issue daily invoices

    - Handling Account Receivable, Account Payable, Updating Aging report.

    - Assist in day to day operations and activities of the Accounts department.

    - Assist with preparation and coordination of the audit process.

    - Ensure proper filing and maintenance of accounting records.

    - Assist in corporate matters and ad­hoc tasks when required.

    Company Overview

    ● 有关 Sean Business International 是一家从事什么行业的公司? 

    我们 Sean Business International 的服务是《帮助好的员工找到好的老板，帮助好的老板找到好的员工》 

    同时我们也设计系统帮助老板解决员工不会自动自发、团队不团结和业绩不能增长的问题。 

    我们其中一个最著名的系统就是以绩效表现来算薪酬的 Performance Based Super Salary & Commission System (简称 SCS)。 

    "SCS 绩效薪酬系统" 协助老板留住优秀的员工，和让优秀的员工也不用每个月只能领取固定薪酬、让好的员工们可以得到公平的待遇。 

    ● 有关Sean Business International 的历史: 

    Sean Business International 是由刘俊贤先生所创办的，人称他为 Sean老师。

    从 2005 年到现在， Sean老师总共累积了超过一万个小时的实战市场经验，他也是亚洲拥有最多成功案例的市场策略权威之一。 

    他所创办的公司，Sean Business International，也在短短的五年内达到每一年的业绩超越马币千万元！ Sean老师的热忱就是解决生意对内和对外的问题。 

    他成功大幅度地增加超过 150 种各行各业的生意盈利、加上估计超过 500个不同的企业成功故事。

    ● 我们的使命是什么? 

    Sean Business International 的使命是:

    - 让天下没有难带的团队、

    - 让天下没有不能抽身的老板、

    - 和让天下的员工可以过更好的生活，开开心心工作。

    ● 我们的远景 

    随着公司持续成长，我们正在扩充海外市场，扩展生意的版图，希望引进愿意与公司同步成长，肯为公司付出，协助他人成长的队友加入我们的团队，与我们一起迈向国际市场，协助更多的企业老板，达成我们的使命。

    ● 我们的价值观

    通过帮助生意老板来帮助他们的员工，因为我们都是为了改善生活和我们的家庭而工作。

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Bayan Lepas.
    Apply Online
